title: Teaching Companies to Do Good While Innovating
itunes:title: Teaching Companies to Do Good While Innovating
description:
Kevin Maney, Founding Partner of Category Design Advisors, discusses his book "Intended Consequences: How to Build Market-Leading Companies with Responsible Innovation."

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
